synopsis.text: She is diligent, level-headed, and a second-year high school student - meet Shiina Kokomi, the lead performer of her school's rhythmic gymnastics club. As she navigates the complexities of high school life, she forms a tight-knit circle of friends who learn to lean on each other in times of adversity. Inspired by the popular mobile game, Girlfriend (Kari), this anime offers viewers a glimpse into the everyday trials and triumphs of high school girls, as they face their challenges head-on and discover the importance of camaraderie and support. Join Kokomi and her friends as they embark on this heartwarming journey, and witness the unbreakable bonds that form when you find your tribe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
